text: Lavenia Tinai (born September 7, 1990) is a Fijian rugby union player. She represents Fiji in rugby sevens and made her debut in 2012. She was selected to represent Fiji at the 2016 Summer Olympics as a member of the Fiji women's national rugby sevens team. She is the sister of former Fiji 7's rep, Ilai Tinai == References == == External links == * Category:1990 births Category:Rugby sevens players at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic rugby sevens players of Fiji Category:Fijian international rugby sevens players Category:Fiji female rugby union players Category:Living people
title: Lavenia Tinai
